structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Deputies And Administrators; Appointment And Removal
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] He may, subject to confirmation by the governor, appoint and may for cause remove a second, third and fourth deputy auditor, administrator of field operations of state audits and an administrator of field operations of authority audits. Chapter 11: Deputies and administrators; appointment and removal [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 108 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The state auditor may appoint and may for cause remove a second, third and fourth deputy auditor, administrator of field operations of state audits and an administrator of field operations of authority audits.
